summary: I am an experienced Analyst and Manager dedicated to bridging the gap between raw data and real-world results. My passion lies in developing analysis that does more than just report numbersâ€”it creates insights and drives performance. I thrive in cross-functional settings, partnering with diverse teams to solve complex problems under tight deadlines.

achievements: Led the redesign of the core SaaS dashboard, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement and a 15% drop in churn rate.
Established a comprehensive Design System utilized by 5 cross-functional teams, reducing frontend development time by 30%.
Mentored 3 junior designers and conducted weekly design critiques to foster a culture of continuous feedback.
Collaborated with clients to deliver responsive e-commerce websites for various fashion and retail brands.
Conducted A/B testing on landing pages which increased conversion rates by an average of 12% across client projects.
Created high-fidelity interactive prototypes in Figma for stakeholder presentations.
Assisted in the implementation of the company's marketing site using React and Tailwind CSS.
Optimized image assets and code splitting, improving page load speeds by 40%.
